description: Lists all custom and Amazon Web Services locations.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters the list for AWS or CUSTOM locations. (string) ---

nested_items.name: LocationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name ( ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift location resource and uniquely identifies it. ARNs are unique across all Regions. Format is arn:aws:gamelift:<region>::location/location-a1234567-b8c9-0d1e-2fa3-b45c6d7e8912.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates where to resume retrieving results on the next call to this operation. If no token is returned, these results represent the end of the list.
